details.sectionContent: It is a practical experience of the SSB interview.
The event focuses on testing the physical and mental skills.

Time duration:- 1 hour
Time:- 11:00 to 12:00
The first round will have 50 questions which the participants have to attempt in 1 hour. Top 40 participants will be selected for next round. The question paper will have topics of general knowledge, current affairs, grammar and verbal skills.

Time:- 1:00 p.m. to 4:30p.m.
Time duration:- 3.5 hours
The first round will have 50 questions which the participants have to attempt in 1 hour. Top 40 participants will be selected for next round. The question paper will have topics of general knowledge, current affairs, grammar and verbal skills.
After the first round the participants will be divided into 10 teams each containing 4 members.
Each team will have to complete an obstacle track using ropes, planks, wood logs etc.
Top 2 teams who covers the track in minimum time will proceed to the last round.

Time duration:- 2 hours
The final round will be conducted on next day.
SSB style interview will be conducted by a panel of experts.
According to the marks given by the panel, the winner will be declared.
